bio:
Coldhearted Gravedigger is a Nord woman who has been digging around in the Hall of the Dead in Windhelm. She wears farm clothes along with a pair of boots and a pair of gloves. She carries an iron dagger.
Quotes:
“I'm dying for a rest. I swear, I could lie down right now, and just sleep forever.”
name: Coldhearted Gravedigger
